text: <@U1HKQRLMR> and <@U0260V4K1> we have approval to proceed with the case study so long as we share a draft!  At this point, i’m going to respond with a reminder of schedule and float some photos with her.  anything else come to mind?

and <@U02F9CXTL> i got a blanket response to ‘not shoot Googlers or barands’ - at this point how critical is it that we have extras in the shoot?  If critical, I will request but it adds complexity and may bog the thing down so I want to be sure we know exactly what we ned
Nothing else comes to mind on my end besides floating photos by her! Then we'll get her drafts as next steps.

cool, i gotta take it one step at a time, as we confirm someone to help escort us when we’re onsite, then need to get her to remember that brandlab is a private space an that we need to shoot googlers :slightly_smiling_face:
